mapper.select: select m.name, im.gender , im.addr, im.addr_dtl , r.gradu gradu, r.resum_no as sno from member m join i_member im on m.mem_no = im.mem_no join resum r on r.mem_no = im.mem_no where r.resum_no = #{sNo} and mem_gbn = 0

select rw.work_type wtype , r.pay_max rpaymax , r.pay_min rpaymin, st.sector_name snm, rg.region_name rnm, ty.city_name city from resum r join resum_work rw on r.resum_no = rw.resum_no join sector st on r.sector_no = st.sector_no join region rg on r.region_no = rg.region_no join city ty on rg.city_no = ty.city_no WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND R.RESUM_NO = #{sNo}

select rq.rating rt, to_char(rq.pass_date,'yy/mm/dd') pd, rq.issu_agcy ia from member m join i_member im on m.mem_no = im.mem_no join resum r on m.mem_no = r.mem_no join resum_qual rq on rq.resum_no = r.resum_no where r.resum_no = #{sNo} and mem_gbn = 0

select rc.c_name rcname, rc.dpart rcdp, to_char(rc.st_date,'yy-mm-dd') rcst , to_char(rc.end_date,'yy-mm-dd') rced, rc.carr_cntt rcct, rc.pos rcp from member m join i_member im on m.mem_no = im.mem_no join resum r on m.mem_no = r.mem_no join resum_carr rc on r.resum_no = rc.resum_no where r.resum_no = #{sNo} and mem_gbn = 0

select re.sch_name as scname, re.sol resol, re.major remajor, to_char(re.st_date,'yy/mm/dd') rest, to_char(re.end_date,'yy/mm/dd') reed, re.edu_etc reee from member m join i_member im on m.mem_no = im.mem_no join resum r on m.mem_no = r.mem_no join resum_edu re on re.resum_no = r.resum_no where r.resum_no = #{sNo} and mem_gbn = 0

select iedu_name eduname, cose_name cosename, to_char(st_date,'yy/mm/dd') st, to_char(end_date,'yy/mm/dd') ed,edu_cntt cnt from member m join i_member im on m.mem_no = im.mem_no join resum r on m.mem_no = r.mem_no join resum_iedu ri on ri.resum_no = r.resum_no where r.resum_no = #{sNo} and mem_gbn = 0

select rs.sintro_name hename , rs.sintro_cntt sintroname, to_char(r.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as DT from member m join i_member im on m.mem_no = im.mem_no join resum r on m.mem_no = r.mem_no join resum_sintro rs on rs.resum_no = r.resum_no where r.resum_no = #{sNo} and mem_gbn = 0

select rf.flang_no fn, rf.flang_type ft, rf.flang_grade fg, fl.flang_name fname from member m join i_member im on m.mem_no = im.mem_no join resum r on m.mem_no = r.mem_no join resum_flang rf on r.resum_no = rf.resum_no join flang fl on rf.flang_no = fl.flang_no where r.resum_no = #{sNo} and mem_gbn = 0

SELECT name, sector_name, region_name, DT, rnum FROM ( SELECT m.name, st.sector_name sector_name , rg.region_name region_name,ct.city_name, TO_CHAR(r.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.resum_no DESC) AS RNUM FROM resum r join member m on r.mem_no = m.mem_no join sector st on r.sector_no = st.sector_no join region rg on r.region_no = rg.region_no join city ct on ct.city_no = rg.city_no WHERE opn_chk = 1 and r.mem_no = 1
) mr WHERE mr.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM resum WHERE opn_chk = 1
